page.title: 05TWO GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: FIREBALL_To play this game the children make a circle by holding hands.Then they drop their hands and pass the ball around the circle in a clockwise direction.If you drop the ball you have to run round the outside of the circle while the rest pass the ball round.If they beat you to your place you are out .The game goes on until there is only one person left in the circle and that child is the winner.OSTIN YARD _First you draw 2 parallel chalk lines 8 metres apart. One child stands between the 2 lines whilst the other children try to run across from one line to the other without being caught by the one in the middle.Anybody caught has to help to catch the other children.The winner is the one who is caught last of all.The first one to be caught is on it for the next game.
